Package peregrine.worker.clientd.requests

Code related to request handling.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
BackendRequestFactory Take a request from the client and construct backend requests for the queue.
RequestSizeable Used so that we can estimate the size of a request before we add an item to the queue.
 

Class Summary
BackendClientWritable ChannelBufferWritable which writes to a Netty channel and uses HTTP chunks.
BackendRequest A request for a set of keys or a scan request against the backend database from the client.
ClientBackendRequest Represents information about a client performing a request including the netty Channel they are using, whether they are suspended, etc.
GetBackendRequest Represents a request to the backend to GET a key.
GetBackendRequestFactory  
ReadyBackendRequestIterator An iterator which only returns items which are ready to perform IO.
ScanBackendRequest Execute and handle SCAN support.
ScanBackendRequestFactory Create SCAN backend requests.
 

Package peregrine.worker.clientd.requests Description

Code related to request handling.
